text: I'm excited to announce Amazon guard
duty our new intelligence-driven threat
detection service Amazon guard duty is a
fully managed continuous security
monitoring and threat detection service
built for the scale of the cloud with a
single click literally a single click
you can enable the service its remove
the complexity of operation that used to
have to go through no matter what your
level of expertise you can get it
functioning on your environment very
rapidly it immediately begins analyzing
billions of events from multiple AWS
data sources including cloud trail and
flow logs and DNS logs it uses an
integrated threat intelligence feed from
our security engineers as well as our
partners at CrowdStrike and Proofpoint
and identifies anomalies in the
operation of your infrastructure and
applies machine learning to identify
threats with great precision for example
a compromised ec2 instance that's mining
Bitcoin or an attacker scanning your
infrastructure for new and application
vulnerabilities it also monitors Eenadu
us account access behavior for signs of
compromised such as is somebody using
your credentials to launch an unusual
instance type in the geography you've
never used before most importantly there
is no footprint your account no
performance impact no reliability issues
with your existing applications or
workloads we operated completely on our
infrastructure there's no agent to
install no sensor to install or network
clients for you to deploy or maintain
just to enable the service and it starts
analyzing raising your security bar
across your organization customers and
partners are always key contributors to
developing new services in AWS and more
than 50 customers and partners have been
using the service and providing feedback
for the past 7 months all of the
partners listed on the slide here have
developed integrations and many are
demonstrating those today at the expo I
encourage you to to seek them out and
take a look we're really excited with
what they
